title: UPDATE: 12-year old boy dies after Sunday morning shooting in York
content:
YORK, Pa.– The York County Coroner’s office says a 12-year old boy, who was shot on Sunday morning, has died.
The coroner’s office says around 7:30 a.m., 12-year old Marlin Banks Jr., was shot inside a home on the 200 block of N. Richland Avenue in the city of York.
The boy died a short time later at York Hospital.
York City Police are investigating the shooting and are calling it an attended death.
An autopsy will be performed on Monday morning at Lehigh Vally Hospital in Allentown.
